text: Luca Pfeiffer (born 20 August 1996) is a German professional footballer who plays as a forward for Danish Superliga club FC Midtjylland. ==Career== In the 2019–20 season Pfeiffer contributed 15 goals as Würzburger Kickers were promoted to the 2. Bundesliga. On 5 October 2020, the last day of the 2020 summer transfer window, Pfeiffer joined Danish Superliga champions FC Midtjylland on a deal until June 2024. The transfer fe paid to Würzburger Kickers was reported as €1.5 million. ==References== ==External links== * * Profile at kicker.de * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bad Mergentheim Category:Footballers from Baden- Württemberg Category:German footballers Category:German expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Stuttgarter Kickers players Category:VfL Osnabrück players Category:SC Paderborn 07 players Category:Würzburger Kickers players Category:FC Midtjylland players Category:3. title: Luca Pfeiffer
